attributes.action: Stop the construction of the proposed 3rd runway at Heathrow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carbon emissions are rising - can we meet reductions in emission targets by encouraging more air travel? There is unused capacity at other London Airports - Heathrow does not need a 3rd runway. Sign this petition to support a freeze on runway expansion at Heathrow.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
